original_text: Then the heathen that are left round about you shall know that I the Lord build the ruined places, and plant that that was desolate: I the Lord have spoken it, and I will do it.
korean_text: 너희 사방에 남은 이방 사람이 나 여호와가 무너진 곳을 건축하며 황폐한 자리에 심은 줄을 알리라 나 여호와가 말하였으니 이루리라

sentences.original_text: Then heathen that are left round about you
shall know that I Lord build ruined places
sentences.korean_translation: 나 주가 무너진 곳을 건축하는 것을 알리라

sentences.original_text: and plant that that was desolate
